thread.section_title: Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb!
thread.title_full: Superb! - Review of Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maire2
title: Superb!
text:
One of the best properties I've stayed in in New York. Spacious studio apartment. Everything you need is supplied - except an electric kettle. Full fridge and freezer. Coffee and tea available 24 hours in ;lobby. Great breakfast, but not much fruit.
Very friendly helpful staff. Place runs like clockwork . This was our second visit and would recommend highly.
Just 200 yards from 39th Ave subway station. Easy access to Manhattan, Times Square etc. quiet area.
Will definitely be back.
Room Tip: All rooms are excellent. See more room tips
